name: Together4ever
description:
You are a blob. NO - You are 4 Blobs!

Switch between the 4 Blobs and try to connect them all to win! If you connect two, you get a special ability.

Controls are really simple:

  • W A S D and Space to control a blob.
  • E to change to one of the other Blobs.
  • R to reset the Level if you messed something up

The Goal:

Connect all 4 Blobs to win a level.

Whats special?

If you connect 2 Blobs they have a special ability which is shown in the lower left screen. You can use that to your advantage!

Whats unfinished?

Unfortunaly i did the whole project alone and 48h is not a lot of time to write almost every line of code new - But overall i think it is already a good gaming-experience.

There are a few bugs - for more information about that just look further down.

Also because of the time limit i could only finish 4 levels which have almost no decoration. With a few hours more there could be done more with the concept i have.

Some Bugs:

  • the rotating spikes sometimes do not kill the player
  • the Levelselect-Screen looks a little bit messed up and shows more level than there really are
  • the "merge" of yellow and blue results sometimes to an gameover (this is unintentional, only the merge of yellow and red should create a death)
  • the special ability that should be shown on the lower left screen is sometimes not visibil
